install.name: Content - GoogleDocs
install.author: soeren
install.description: Used to embed Documents from Google Docs into the website. Syntax is {googledoc docid="xx" type="xx" size="xx"}.

param.name: default_type
param.label: Default Doc Type
param.description: Select a default GoogleDocs Document Type.

param.name: iframe_width_custom
param.label: Custom Iframe width in px
param.description: This is the width of the displayed iframe. If provided, overrides default values from the size setting.

param.name: iframe_height_custom
param.label: Custom Iframe height in px
param.description: This is the height of the displayed iframe. If provided, overrides default values from the size setting.
